value:
You summoned me here to fight, but
I don't want to hurt anyone. I guess it
can't always be avoided though...

Monsters come running when I let
out even the slightest sigh.
It's my curse...

The church has rules, dogma. They
want us all bound to their system so
they can control us. I can't stand it.

You're wasting your time on me. Talk
to Yuri-bird, Coco, or B if you want
someone you can rely on.

You really did summon me to another
world... Even the stars in the sky are
different than the ones above Fódlan.

Hi, I'm Hapi. Don't get too close
though. I'll just set this gift from your
friend $Nf here.

I've come a long way from the young
Hapi who left her village so long ago.
That's what you get.

You can work and train as hard as
you want, but when your time is up,
that's that.
For me? Thanks, I'll keep it.

My name's Hapi. You summoned me
here, but...why? I'm not great at
fighting, and I'll avoid it if I can.

I'm originally from a settlement deep
in the forest. The village was hidden
well enough that no one bothered us.$k$pBut I wasn't satisfied with spending
my whole life there, so I left to go
experience the world.$k$pSoon after, I was caught by some bad
people. Maybe I deserved it for
abandoning my village...$k$pA lot happened after that, but the
Knights of Seiros eventually found me
and sent me to Abyss. Now I'm here.$k$pThis is better than the monastery
though. The people here seem to
care about me, or at least pretend to.$k$pI still don't want to fight, but I'll help
out where I can. For you, and for the
Order of Heroes.
はっ
えいっ
きゃあっ
うわあああああっ
Better you than me.
Not giving up!
You should run!
Don't blame me!
Not yet...
Heh
So you're the summoner, huh? I'm Hapi.
Cut that out.

People keep their distance from me.
It's easier that way.
I don't have good memories of the church.

Loss can lead to despair. But that's OK.
You don't have to be strong all the time.
The kind of world I want doesn't exist.
You're special. I just hope that doesn't get you into trouble.
All right.
Still here.
'Kay.
